projectGridLines.title: Title: Internship with Liquidity Treasury Reporting Analytics (LTRA) team
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Internship with Liquidity Treasury Reporting Analytics (LTRA) team

Description: Liquidity Data Management (LDM) team within LTRA works at a global level, the project would involve understanding and verifying the various sources of feeds, optimization of the same i.e analyzing historical data set with relevance to the current business model, adjustments posted there in for different regions and their subsequent impact to the reporting level hierarchy.

Skill sets: Good knowledge of Excel, Financial Business products.

Traits expectation:

Expected learning: Liquidity Reporting (LCR), Data Feed Analysis

Specific courses required for project execution: Any MBA with core Finance Background.
